channel.title: PolarScape V1 - New Release! - Source + Client! - 1k+ Downloads!
channel.description:
[size=36pt][b]POST A COMMENT THEY MAKE ME FEEL HAPPY[/b][/size]
Leechers GTFO TY [b]This is my first source so dont hate![/b]
Hey thanks for viewing my Open Source and Open Client, Well Lets Get Started...
Features [code]-Barrows -New Home Coded By Me -New Shops Coded By Me -New Train Coded By Me -New Staff Zone Coded By Me -New Donater Zone Coded By Me -Bandos Godwars -Customs -Funpk -Teampk -Skills Zone -Gs Mini -Db Mini -Cool Outfit Mini -Owner and Mod Wear -Small Quest -1v1 Pking -Slayer Tower -Kbd -Jad -Anti SYI[/code]
Pictures Yay! [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0005.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0006.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0011.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0012.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0014.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0015.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0015.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0018.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0019.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0020.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0021.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0023.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0024.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0025.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0026.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0027.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0028.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0029.png[/img] [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0030.png[/img] Client: [IMG]http://i395.photobucket.com/albums/pp40/MiniMario39/evolved0000.png[/img]
Downloads! Client: http://uppit.com/v/V0GWSJFP Source: http://uppit.com/v/W2BKBD1P
Credits: I weed I - 50% For Source Polar(me) - 35% For Editing Moparscape - 10% For Tuts And Support Jagex - 5% For Models
[b]if your gonna leech atleast give me some credits :)[/b]

item.title: PolarScape V1 - New Release! - Source + Client! - 1k+ Downloads!
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

PolarScape:

ive added a staff zone donater zone coded new home and shops added a few customs added a new minigame changed around godwars… i did more then changed a few things…

So, You say that a new home is edge? All you did was move the npc’s around(I don’t know about whats in the shops so I’ll let you go there). The minigames are horrible, Kill monsters in order? Give us something different the npc fighting for a mini-game. And the other mini-game for the armor, There are only 2 npc’s(that I can see) so how hard can that be? I’ve seen the donator area several times before, I’ve seen that training area several thousand times. But I can put it this way…I’m a nice guy(Sorta xD) so I will give you some credit for doing this, Again…Most people fail on there first time of coding. I’ll gratz you for actually making an attempt at this. And I know this is v1 so, I’ll give you more time to make a v2 and so on. Maybe I am completely wrong about you and you are the worlds best programmer. I don’t know. I’ll sit back and wait for v2 to come out and see if it improves. (The bs(bandos)fighting thing i’ve never seen and the 3rd age place i’ve never seen also)

Read full topic
